title: Topic 001 Question 175
body: You have developed an application that consists of multiple microservices, with each microservice packaged in its own Docker container image. You want to deploy the entire application on Google Kubernetes Engine so that each microservice can be scaled individually. What should you do?
options: Create and deploy a Custom Resource Definition per microservice.
Create and deploy a Docker Compose File.
Create and deploy a Job per microservice.
Create and deploy a Deployment per microservice.
